meanings.sent1: The kitten will miaul when it is hungry.
meanings.sent2: Sometimes cats miaul to communicate with their owners.
meanings.sent3: I heard the neighbor's cat miaul loudly for food.
meanings.sent4: The wind made the tree branches miaul in the night.
meanings.sent5: The lost kitten's miauling could be heard from afar.

meanings.sent1: The miaul of the cat woke me up in the morning.
meanings.sent2: I love the soft miaul of my pet cat.
meanings.sent3: The miaul of the cat sounded like a tiny trumpet.
meanings.sent4: The miaul of the cat echoed through the empty alley.
meanings.sent5: The miaul of the cat was a comforting sound in the house.
